build.buildCommand: export DATABASE_URL="mysql://${MYSQLUSER}:${MYSQLPASSWORD}@${MYSQLHOST}:${MYSQLPORT}/${MYSQLDATABASE}" && npx prisma generate && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: export DATABASE_URL="mysql://${MYSQLUSER}:${MYSQLPASSWORD}@${MYSQLHOST}:${MYSQLPORT}/${MYSQLDATABASE}" && npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && npm run create-admin && npm start
